game.name: NebulArena
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Build, customize, and unleash your ultimate space platform in NebulArena, a fast-paced, fully automated PvP arena where strategy, design, and destruction collide!
